Interface LogSupporter

    AggregatedEvaluationStatisticsExporter, DatasetProvider, EvaluationStatisticsExporter, EvaluationStatisticsHandler, Evaluator, Experiment, ExperimentFileHandler, FileBasedEvaluationStatisticsExporter, FileBasedEvaluationStatisticsHandler, FileBasedMeasurementEvaluationStatisticsExporter, IncrementalEvaluationStatisticsHandler, OptionalIncrementalEvaluationStatisticsHandler

    public interface LogSupporter
    Interface for classes that support logging.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
